Rulings.Edison:
●Sinister Seeds can be activated when the monster destroyed by battle is sent to the GY.
●Sinister Seeds can't be activated if you won't have enough open Monster Card Zones for every Sinister Seed Token that would be Special Summoned. You can't activate Sinister Seeds when you receive 3000 or more battle damage.
●You can't activate Sinister Seeds if you don't receive at least 500 points of Battle Damage.

Rulings.Base: 1. "Sinister Seeds" can be activated when the monster destroyed by battle is sent to the GY.\n2. "Sinister Seeds" cannot be activated if you will not have enough open Monster Card Zones for every Sinister Seed Token that would be Special Summoned. You cannot activate "Sinister Seeds" when you receive 3000 or more battle damage.\n3. You cannot activate "Sinister Seeds" if you do not receive at least 500 points of Battle Damage.

PSCT.Base: When a monster you control is destroyed by a battle in which you took damage, and it was in face-up Attack Position at the start of the Damage Step and when it was destroyed: Special Summon 1 "Sinister Seed Token" (Plant-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK 100/DEF 100) for every 500 points of battle damage you took from that battle.
